title: Maksim Schastlivtsev
text:
Maksim Valentinovich Schastlivtsev (; born 10 May 1986) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="FC%20Chita">FC Chita</a>.
Club career.
He made his <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> debut for <a href="FC%20SKA-Energiya%20Khabarovsk">FC SKA-Energiya Khabarovsk</a> on 5 May 2006 in a game against <a href="FC%20Angusht%20Nazran">FC Angusht Nazran</a>.
